name: Hikikomori Simulator
description:
Hikikomori Simulator is a stat-management game where you attempt to keep the titular hikikomori (Japanese for social recluse) in their room at all costs! Pick activities for your hikikomori to do and keep an eye on their stats to make sure they are clean, fed, entertained and relaxed in the only place they can call home — their room.

Created by Joey Yeo (@yeojoey) and Niki Yeo (@yeo_niki) for Ludum Dare 46. 
Audio from Kenney.nl

How To Play:

Choose activities from the panel on the right. It's game over when Stress reaches 100 or when any other stat hits 0! How many days can you keep the hikikomori in their room?

Stats (left to right, up to down): Fullness, Energy, Fun, Hygiene, Social, Stress
